check.name: StaticVariableName
check.description: Checks that {@code static}, non-{@code final} variable names conform to a specified pattern.

property.name: applyToPublic
property.description: Controls whether to apply the check to public member.

property.name: applyToProtected
property.description: Controls whether to apply the check to protected member.

property.name: applyToPackage
property.description: Controls whether to apply the check to package-private member.

property.name: applyToPrivate
property.description: Controls whether to apply the check to private member.
